title: Beauty Report with Amy Morrison Special Edition 09.03.2017 - 08 PM
description:
This special edition, we're discussing innovative products including Silk'n FaceFX Anti-aging device, Theragrow Wearable Hair Growth Device, and more! Amy shares her latest beauty tips and trends. From hair and makeup to skincare and fragrance, it's new every week. 

*Prices shown on the previously recorded video may not represent the current price. Visit http://www.hsn.com to view the current selling price.
